document.full_text: the former n.f.l. wide receiver drew hill, 54, a two-time pro bowler, died at an atlanta hospital friday after two massive strokes, his agent said.
document.title: sports briefing | football: ex-pro bowler drew hill dies of stroke at 54
lines_and_colors: the former n.f.l. wide receiver drew hill, 54, a two-time pro bowler, died at an atlanta hospital friday after two massive strokes, his agent said.
